---
title: Microeconometrics I
---

Teaching assistance of Microeconometrics I. EESP 2021

- [Class 1](https://raw.githack.com/rfbressan/ta_microeconometrics/master/01-data.table.html): Introduction to data.table R package
- [Class 2](https://raw.githack.com/rfbressan/ta_microeconometrics/master/02-fixest.html): Linear Regressions with fixest R package
- [Class 3](https://raw.githack.com/rfbressan/ta_microeconometrics/master/03-MDE.html): Minimum Detectable Effect
  + [3.1 Inference](https://raw.githack.com/rfbressan/ta_microeconometrics/master/031-Inference.html)
  + [3.2 Power](https://raw.githack.com/rfbressan/ta_microeconometrics/master/power.html)
- [Class 4](https://raw.githack.com/rfbressan/ta_microeconometrics/master/04-bootstrap.html): Bootstrap and Randomization Inference
- [Class 5](https://raw.githack.com/rfbressan/ta_microeconometrics/master/05-observables.html): Propensity Score and Covariates Balancing
- [Class 6](https://raw.githack.com/rfbressan/ta_microeconometrics/master/06-estimation.html): Estimations: Matching, Subclassification and Doubly-Robust
- [Class 7](https://raw.githack.com/rfbressan/ta_microeconometrics/master/07-manski.html): Manski Bounds
